official_title: Post-Discharge Opioid Reduction Intervention for Open, Laparoscopic, and Endoscopic Surgery (ORIOLES): A Quality Improvement Study of Prescribing Habits and Patient Education
inclusion_criteria:
* All patients diagnosed with prostate cancer and enrolled in NCT03006562
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients not undergoing radical prostatectomy (for the primary pre-post ORIOLES study)
